comments.body: Could you please open a PR to this project to also add the ``License.txt`` in the package?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@  home: https://www.bloomberg.com/professional/support/api-library/
  license: Copyright 2012. Bloomberg Finance L.P.
  license_file: License.txt
  summary: 'Python SDK for Bloomberg BLPAPI (<=3.9)'
